name: GetMobileDevicesTask
description: Use this build step to retrieve resources from a Mobile Center server
author: Micro Focus

inputs.name: mcServerUrl
inputs.label: Mobile Center Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your Mobile Center server, in the format http[s]://(MC server name):(port)

inputs.name: mcUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username that will access this Mobile Center server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this Mobile Center server during the build step run

inputs.name: mcResources
inputs.label: Resources to retrieve
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose what resource will be retrieved from the Mobile Center server

inputs.name: includeOfflineDevices
inputs.label: Include disconnected devices in response
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether to include the disconnected devices within the list of devices retrieved by running this task
